overview: A woman in her thirties decides to leave her house in order to escape the feeling of a suffocation that makes her life impossible.  The harder she tries to erase her existence from the house, the stronger the house clings to her. Objects, possessions, and ghosts of other people seem to be holding on to her.  Worries and disturbances bring her closer to them. That day, the woman realises she cannot undo anything that existsâ€”even herself
title: As If I Never Existed
